1.content:
Its about 2AM when you are kick out of your favorite bar. "Sorry Jake your one of my closest friends but I think you had enough." as you begin to try to walk to your car you realize you walk here from your house tonight.

"Do you need me to get a cab I'll paid for it?" the bar owner said whit concern in his voice.

"I will be fine." you say whit your drunk voice "I dont live that far."

whit worry in his eyes he say "Ok just be careful tonight. Go home and get some sleep."

you start to walk home as you do you think about what has happened in the last few days. Frist your girlfriend that you were dating for 2 years and was about to ask her to marry you cheated whit some random guy whit a mohawk. Second you had to take time off work because you had a arm injury while working and last be not the worst your car breaks down and it will cost you about 600 bucks it fix.

"Things cant any worse right?" you ask your self.

you walk for another 10 minutes you realize you made a wrong trun and ended up in were the old factorys were you decide in your drunk state you want to check one of them out.

Which one?
1.title: The night to remember

11.content:
You go into Friend maker because you need a friend to talk to right now. After removing some wooden boards you slip inside to see it completely dark. you pull out your phone and start to look around when you found the office area.

You look around and found some newspapers talking about how this factory was almost fully automated with make life size dolls. You laugh as you continue down the hall thinking about how these dolls must look and that you need to see one.

You arrived to the assembly floor looking around you dont see any dolls here "They must have moved them to storage when this place closed." you say whit some disappoint in your voice. You continued walking into you see a power box, after opening it you flip a few switches and like that the dark building lights up.

"At least I can see I guess." you said.

Then you saw something a life size unmade doll. "May be I can make a doll." you think to your self. As look around a bit more you see where the dolls needs to go to be made. In a few minutes the doll was in place and you found the control panel you turned on the mechanical device and the factory sprung to life. As this happens the fell down and you went to pick it back up. When you step on the platform robotic arms grab you and lift you up onto the conveyor belt been still hold down by the arms you start to go to the frist part of the machine.

What doll settings were selected?
11.title: Friend Maker (Doll factory)

choices: You try to fine a way out of this suft
114.content:
You selected Princess Annabel a very popular choice this factory was know for. As you move down the conveyor belt you see some red lights go on and start to scan you.

The computer list of priorities

*Body needs reform*

*hair and makeup need to be applied*

*Dress selected Princess outfit 1*

*Voice box installation*

*Set name princess best friend eats sleeps and poops*

*Begin assemble*

The red light fades as you move down to the next station. The arm that are holding you down moves you into a new position as a metal box starts to come from the ceiling. Its quite for a moment the you see a clear liquid come from a hole from the top of the box. As the box fills up the box warms up. The liquid changes to a white color as it forms a brick you can't move.

About a few minutes goes by then you are released (good thing it didn't cover your head). You see some arms coming back with what look like saw blades. you scream in horror as they cut the plastic box your trapped in lucky you were not hurt and can move but you now had a nice pair of tits and ass. Before you can jump off arms grab you again and hold you still as more tools came out this time drills.

About 10 minutes goes by and your ass and nuts never felt more in pain at least you can use the bath room. you continued on the conveyor belt another liquid is sprayed on you you then fill as your facel hair and hair fall off.

The arms then put you in a chair where you are strapped in and your head was froced to be up right and cant move. the chair moves down to the next station as you can now see a mirror. the robotic arms come from the mirror and grad sone make up and go to town on your face. after that a wig is put on you whit a liquid on it (you think its glue) as its bening hold still on your head you see a small box coming towards you as the arms froced open your mouth you see the box open whit a microchip as it was shoved into your mouth to the back of your neck you also gag as it was installed you finally say something "What the fuck is wrong whit this place!" you are in shock as your voice now sounds like a woman. When you hair was dry where it wont come off it was styled you then was move to the next station.

the chair drop you down Into a small room where you can finally can move around as you look at your body you look like a full grown human female whot blond hair and nice tits. Before you can find a way out your grab again and move to the centre of the room.

More arms come out of the walls and are holding different pieces of clothing then they begin.

First very girlish panties where side up your legs while a matching bra was being set then white stockings are slide up your leg then a pink princess dress was over your head then was set in place as the arms tied the back. Last be not least the crown and heel where put on the arms then got you out of the room in your new get up

you now look like this https://www.pinterest.com/pin/8620875536...

what happens next?
114.title: Princess Annabel

choices: Run away and down the hall
Protest that you are not the one on the form
Let her pick you up (you are still drunk)
12.content:
You remember reading about the new life factory. The factory was built to give a rising amount of abandoned babys who at the time couldn't stay in a government run orphan due to the fact the last mayor was stealing money from said project for his self about 5 years ago. The factory was designed to take care of the kids into they were adopted by loving homes or were get to the age of 18 were they can go into a other facility to started there lives. But it closeted when the new mayor made things right and secured the funds needed to open a orphan, after that the factory was shut down when the owners knew that kids would be safe and not have to grow up on the streets.

You start to get curious the
factory never had any staff work there. So how did it work to take care of all those kids for 5 years with no staff. You saw a small opening where you could get in while walking around.

After getting in you start to look around and see many rooms, as you try opening one of the doors it wont budge. You walk down the hall to what looks like the front of the building where there was chairs and tables whit a desk near the hallway where you just came from. You also see a stairway up to where you think is the office.

As you walk upstairs you see the office was unlocked and started looking around. It look like the head office where all the paperwork was done and the keys where hanging on the wall. As you start looking through the papers you see that the owners made this whole place automated, From the dapper changers to the nurses (which were robots). Then you had the idea that you needed to see one of these robots up close. Grabbing the keys and heading back down stairs you see behind the front desk a small box. After what feels like 30 minutes the box came open and you saw it's a power box. You start to flip switches and the building comes to life as you closed the box and then you sat down and wait after reading the papers you know a nurse robot will come down here and man the front desk. As you hear a lot of sound coming from the hallway you got ready and pull out your phone.

You then see a female looking android in a nurse outfit walk to the front desk and starts typing on the computer. As you take a picture you see she was well matined not much damage on the outside and it seems to be running very well. As you start to walk forward it doesn't paid any attention to you into you touch a screen whit a per fill out form and accidentally submitted the form and android stops typing and looks at you.

You get a little creeped out and started to walk away when the android starts to walk towards you. "Come here little one. Welcome to you new home."

what do you do?
12.title: New life (Baby factory)

124.content:
Your drunk mind barely registers what the nurse android had said before she grabs you and begins to carry you. You give a yelp, more in shock than pain, as the bot begins to carry you deeper into the factory. "Uh, hey! Stop! Let me go!" You protest trying to wiggle out of the grasp but the nurse droid simple makes shushing noises and shifts her grip to a more secure hold.

After a moment you found yourself in a new part of the factory. You looked around noticing that, with the exception of a large covered conveyer belt running down the center, the whole place looked like a big nursery.

Colorful rooms clearly build for children of very young age, where across the sides. Some had toddler beds, but most held cribs. A large room that seemed to double as a playroom and kitchen was at the very end of the section. The smaller individual rooms were sparkly decorated, apparently only being used for sleep by the former inhabitants. Each smaller room had small conveyer belts leading form them to the main belt which itself emptied into the playroom. You realize what was happening when the nurse droid set you on the main belt. “New subject is ready, commence caretaker procedure.” The nurse droid said as the factory seemed to whirl to life.

“Hey Wait! This isn’t right!” You cry sitting up and preparing to make a break for it. “Subject is attempting escape!” The nurse droid said moving to block your dash. In your panicked and drunk state, you didn’t swerve in time and instead ran head first into her.

The droid didn’t even flinch. You however were seeing stars and muttering incoherently. Surprisingly it didn’t hurt all that much. Probably from a combination of alcohol and adrenaline. “Naughty boy.” The nurse scolded picking you back up and setting you back onto the belt.

“Subject in being naughty, commence restraining.” The nurse ordered. Your head still ringing you were only vaguely aware of the cartoonish looking mechanical hands grabbed you and gently, but firmly arranging you on the belt and hold you down. “Restrains in place, commencing processing.”

You shake your head getting some senses back as the nurse droid hits some buttons and speaks some more as the rest of the factory roars to life. You only catch bits and pieces but before the conveyer started to carry you towards the opening where you hear the nurse clearly say.

“Preparations complete. Processing commencing. Prepare facilities for a new...”
124.title: Let her pick you up (you are still drunk)

13.content:
You walk to the site of Androids are us it was a while since this place was in business. The robots they made where always so life like I did creep you out a little when you saw one but after they grew bigger the company decided to out sorce there many production to off to other countries. But in the last year the company went bankrupt and had to closed there factory was still here but they where gone.

You see a sign saying "Do not enter." In all caps hanging on the front door as you look around you see the back door and lucky it was unlocked.

As you enter you feel a strange coldness in the building and you thought you were being watched every second. As you continue down this cold factory you see the main assembly line. You see a lot of unfinished robots. The robots this place made was always so expensive and by the time you had the money to get one the company shut down this factory you decide you would make a robot for your self.

What robot did you try to make?
13.title: Android are us (Robot factory)

14.content:
more luck in your live then right now. After removing some wooden boards, you slip inside to see it completely dark. you pull out your phone and start to look around when you found the office area.

You look around and found some newspapers talking about how this factory was almost fully automated with make life changes, whatever this meant. You laugh as you continue down the hall thinking about how this was happening.
You arrived to the assembly floor looking around you don’t see any machines or something here "They must have moved them to storage when this place closed." you say whit some disappoint in your voice. You continued walking into you see a power box, after opening it you flip a few switches and like that the dark building lights up.

"At least I can see I guess." you said.

Then you saw something, which looked like a box…a booth…It had some kind of door…
"May be I should step inside." you think to yourself.
14.title: A new you (Personal change Factory)

15.content: Maybe you went somewhere you were not supposed to?

1512.content:
Susie was running down the alley of the larger city. She was being chased by men who want to kidnap her and sell her as a slave on the black market.

As she jumps a fence into a wired factory hopefully she can get some help as the kidnappers still after her.

when she get in the place was dark, No one was there just random boxes. As she did not want to get caught by those men she hind in one of the boxes.

"where is she?" one of the kidnappers say.

"she couldn't have gone far. let's try to -" as one of the kidnappers said as you hear someone yell "Freeze!" you were saved. as you tried to get out of the box you find you cant get out the box was sealed shut as you tried to get the cops attention you fail and is stuck in the box.

As you fall asleep in the box the owners of the factory sent you to the people who order the parts of toys.

what happens when you wake up?
1512.title: Is she in distress and sneaks in

info.brief_description: A factory that makes a new you. (Tg, doll, other)
info.description: You are a young man name Jake after a bad break up whit your long time girlfriend you got drunk and went into a old abandoned factory near the edge of town. You find a control panel and the factory comes to life once again what will happen to you.
